text: Robert Carswell "Bobby" Lowther, Sr. (December 14, 1923 - March 23, 2015), was the only two-sport All-American athlete at Louisiana State University in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. In 1946, he earned the recognition in basketball and track and field. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Military people from Louisiana Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:Sportspeople from Louisiana
title: Bobby Lowther
